text: Muthamil is a lyricist in Tamil film industry. He also worked as supervising engineer at BHEL sub-contracting companies. Later he resigned from his profession and became a lyricist, singer and musician. == Early life and education == == Career == == Interest == == Filmography == === As lyricist === {| class="wikitable" |- !
